Plugins.name: Abbreviations and Acronyms
Plugins.desc: Implements automatic marking of abbreviations and acronyms (terminology).

Plugins.name: Advanced Canvas
Plugins.desc: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!

Plugins.name: Beautitab
Plugins.desc: Creates a customizable new tab view with beautiful backgrounds, quotes, search, and more.

Plugins.name: Better Search Views
Plugins.desc: Outliner-like breadcrumb trees for search, backlinks and embedded queries

Plugins.name: Better Word Count
Plugins.desc: Counts the words of selected text in the editor.

Plugins.name: Blur
Plugins.desc: Create obfuscated blocks of text.

Plugins.name: Calendar
Plugins.desc: Calendar view of your daily notes

Plugins.name: Callout Integrator
Plugins.desc: Integrate long blocks of text into callouts and easier nested callouts

Plugins.name: Callout Manager
Plugins.desc: Easily create and customize callouts.

Plugins.name: Callout menu
Plugins.desc: Adds some extra options to callouts context menu and allows you to add your own custom callouts.

Plugins.name: Callout Suggestions
Plugins.desc: Adds a fuzzy searched suggestion modal for callouts.

Plugins.name: Canvas Card Background Remover
Plugins.desc: You can make the background of cards transparent in the Canvas

Plugins.name: Canvas Keyboard Pan
Plugins.desc: Pan around your canvas using the keyboard

Plugins.name: Canvas Link Optimizer
Plugins.desc: Optimize canvas links by displaying a page thumbnail.

Plugins.name: Canvas Links
Plugins.desc: Show the links between "Canvas" and "File".

Plugins.name: Canvas Mindmap
Plugins.desc: A plugin to make your canvas work like a mindmap.

Plugins.name: Canvas minimap
Plugins.desc: For easy navigation in large canvas

Plugins.name: Chord Sheets
Plugins.desc: Work with chord sheets (chords over lyrics) in your Vault: Chord diagrams, transpose, autoscroll and more. Works in live preview and reading mode.

Plugins.name: Commander
Plugins.desc: Customize your workspace by adding commands everywhere, create Macros and supercharge your mobile toolbar.

Plugins.name: Code Styler
Plugins.desc: Style and customize codeblocks and inline code in both editing mode and reading mode.

Plugins.name: Color Folders and Files
Plugins.desc: Customize the appearance of folders and files in the file explorer.

Plugins.name: Colored Tags Wrangler
Plugins.desc: Assign colors to tags. Has integrations with other plugins, like Kanban.

Plugins.name: Continuous Mode
Plugins.desc: Displays all open notes in a tab group as if they were a continuous scrollable document (sometimes called "Scrivenings mode"). Open all notes in Continuous Mode from a folder, search results, or links in a file or Dataview/query block; use arrow keys to navigate between notes; display notes in “Compact Mode” similar to Evernote or Bear; reorder notes via tab header drag-and-drop, sorting, more.

Plugins.name: Tab Switcher
Plugins.desc: Switch your tabs with Ctrl + Tab in recently used order like in a browser.

Plugins.name: Quick Switcher++
Plugins.desc: Enhanced Quick Switcher, search open panels, and symbols.

Plugins.name: Dataview
Plugins.desc: Complex data views for the data-obsessed.

Plugins.name: Double Click Tab
Plugins.desc: A plugin to modify the default behavior when you double click on the tab title, like close tab.

Plugins.name: Dynamic Outline
Plugins.desc: Adds a customizable GitHub-like floating table of contents.

Plugins.name: Editing Toolbar
Plugins.desc: The Obsidian Editing Toolbar is modified from cmenu, which provides more powerful customization settings and has many built-in editing commands to be a MS Word-like toolbar editing experience.

Plugins.name: Enhanced Annotations
Plugins.desc: Add a sidebar view for comments and highlights.

Plugins.name: Enhanced Copy
Plugins.desc: Copy your selection and add it some edit to paste in other markdown software. Allows to keep markdown in reading view, removing wikilinks in editing, copy from locked canvas, and more!

Plugins.name: Execute Code
Plugins.desc: Allows to execute code snippets within a note. Supported programming languages:  C, CPP, Dart, Golang, Groovy, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Lean, Lua, CSharp, Prolog, Rust, Python, R, Ruby, Wolfram Mathematica, Haskell, Scala, Racket, F#, Batch, Shell & Powershell.

Plugins.name: File Explorer++
Plugins.desc: Hide and pin files and folders in the file explorer using custom filters, such as wildcards and regex, based on their names, paths, and tags. Additionally, achieve the same with a single click in the file menu.

Plugins.name: Folder notes
Plugins.desc: Create notes within folders that can be accessed without collapsing the folder, similar to the functionality offered in Notion.

Plugins.name: Folders to Graph
Plugins.desc: Display your vault folder structure into your graphs.

Plugins.name: Nested tags graph
Plugins.desc: Links nested tags in graph view

Plugins.name: Homepage
Plugins.desc: Open a specified note, canvas, or workspace on startup, or set it for quick access later.

Plugins.name: Hotkey Helper
Plugins.desc: Easily see and access any plugin's settings or hotkey assignments (and conflicts) from the Community Plugins tab

Plugins.name: Iconic
Plugins.desc: Customize your icons and their colors directly from the UI, including tabs, files, bookmarks, tags, properties, and ribbon commands.

Plugins.name: Image Converter
Plugins.desc: Convert, compress, resize, annotate, markup, draw, crop, rotate, flip, align images directly in Obsidian. Drag-resize, rename with variables, batch process. WEBP, JPG, PNG, HEIC, TIF.

Plugins.name: No more flickering inline math
Plugins.desc: Remove flickering inline math.

Plugins.name: Insert Multiple Attachments
Plugins.desc: Allows to insert multiple attachments at a time

Plugins.name: JS Engine
Plugins.desc: Run JavaScript from within your notes.

Plugins.name: Lazy Plugin Loader
Plugins.desc: Load plugins with a delay on startup, so that you can get your app startup down into the sub-second loading time.

Plugins.name: Link Favicons
Plugins.desc: See the favicon for a linked website.

Plugins.name: Link Preview
Plugins.desc: Show a preview of external links on hover

Plugins.name: Links
Plugins.desc: Manipulate links

Plugins.name: Ordered List Style
Plugins.desc: Set ordered list style inline in Obsidian.md. Alphabetic lists, roman numeral lists, etc.

Plugins.name: Better Math in Callouts & Blockquotes
Plugins.desc: Add better Live Preview support for math rendering inside callouts & blockquotes.

Plugins.name: Media Notes
Plugins.desc: Take notes on YouTube videos and podcasts with media controls and timestamps.

Plugins.name: Mouse Navigation
Plugins.desc: Enables smooth navigation using mouse gestures for scrolling and switching pages.

Plugins.name: Jump to link
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows open a link in current document or regex based navigation in editor mode using hotkey

Plugins.name: Multi Properties
Plugins.desc: Adds Properties to multiple notes at once.  Either right-click a folder, or select multiple notes and right-click the selection.

Plugins.name: Natural Language Dates
Plugins.desc: Create date-links based on natural language

Plugins.name: Note Refactor
Plugins.desc: Extract note content into new notes and split notes

Plugins.name: Note Toolbar
Plugins.desc: Add customizable toolbars to your notes.

Plugins.name: Novel word count
Plugins.desc: Displays a word count (and more!) for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.

Plugins.name: Auto Link Title
Plugins.desc: This plugin automatically fetches the titles of links from the web

Plugins.name: Checklist Reset
Plugins.desc: Adds a command to reset the state of any checklists in a document in Obsidian.

Plugins.name: Copy Block Link
Plugins.desc: Get links to blocks and headings from Obsidian's right click menu

Plugins.name: Cursor Location
Plugins.desc: This displays the location of the cursor (character and line number).

Plugins.name: Day and Night
Plugins.desc: An Obsidian plugin to automatically toggle themes between day theme and night theme on a set time schedule.

Plugins.name: Discord Rich Presence
Plugins.desc: Update your Discord Status to show your friends what you are working on in Obsidian. With Discord Rich Presence.

Plugins.name: Doubleshift
Plugins.desc: Open the command palette by pressing Shift (or any other key) twice like in IntelliJ and create your own shortcuts

Plugins.name: Folder Focus Mode
Plugins.desc: Focus file explorer on chosen folder and its files and subdirectories, while hiding all the other elements.

Plugins.name: Footnote Shortcut
Plugins.desc: Insert and write footnotes faster

Plugins.name: Git
Plugins.desc: Integrate Git version control with automatic backup and other advanced features.

Plugins.name: Hider
Plugins.desc: Hide UI elements such as tooltips, status, titlebar and more

Plugins.name: Hover Editor
Plugins.desc: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance

Plugins.name: Icon Shortcodes
Plugins.desc: Insert emoji and custom icons with shortcodes

Plugins.name: LanguageTool Integration
Plugins.desc: Inofficial LanguageTool plugin

Plugins.name: Latex Suite
Plugins.desc: Make typesetting LaTeX math as fast as handwriting through snippets, text expansion, and editor enhancements

Plugins.name: Limelight
Plugins.desc: Put a spotlight on your active pane

Plugins.name: Linter
Plugins.desc: Formats and styles your notes. It can be used to format YAML tags, aliases, arrays, and metadata; footnotes; headings; spacing; math blocks; regular markdown contents like list, italics, and bold styles; and more with the use of custom rule options as well.

Plugins.name: List Callouts
Plugins.desc: Create simple callouts in lists.

Plugins.name: Meta Bind
Plugins.desc: Make your notes interactive with inline input fields, metadata displays, and buttons.

Plugins.name: Mindmap NextGen
Plugins.desc: View your Markdown as a mindmap

Plugins.name: Outliner
Plugins.desc: Work with your lists like in Workflowy or RoamResearch.

Plugins.name: Party🎉
Plugins.desc: An implementation of party.js for Obsidian. Create confetti, sparkles and even custom effects in your notes!

Plugins.name: Paste image rename
Plugins.desc: Rename pasted images and all the other attchments added to the vault

Plugins.name: Plugin Update Tracker
Plugins.desc: Know when installed plugins have updates and evaluate the risk of upgrading

Plugins.name: Reading Time
Plugins.desc: Add the current note's reading time to Obsidian's status bar.

Plugins.name: Style Settings
Plugins.desc: Offers controls for adjusting theme, plugin, and snippet CSS variables.

Plugins.name: Trash Explorer
Plugins.desc: Restore and delete files from the Obsidian .trash folder

Plugins.name: Version History Diff
Plugins.desc: Diff the version history of the core Sync and File Recovery plugins and Git. Adds a command to open the core Sync version history as well.

Plugins.name: Force note view mode
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows to force the view mode and editing mode for a note by using front matter

Plugins.name: WakaTime
Plugins.desc: Automatic time tracking and metrics generated from your Obsidian usage activity.

Plugins.name: BRAT
Plugins.desc: Easily install a beta version of a plugin for testing.

Plugins.name: Occura
Plugins.desc: Find and highlight all occurrences of selected text in notes, similar to Notepad++ or IDEs.

Plugins.name: Omnisearch
Plugins.desc: A search engine that just works

Plugins.name: Open with Natural Language Dates
Plugins.desc: Open a daily note using natural language. Requires "Natural Language Dates" plugin to work.

Plugins.name: Optimize Canvas Connections
Plugins.desc: An Obsidian plugin that declutters a canvas by reconnecting notes using their nearest edges.

Plugins.name: Periodic Notes
Plugins.desc: Create/manage your daily, weekly, and monthly notes

Plugins.name: Pixel Banner
Plugins.desc: Apply an image from various sources as a banner to your notes.

Plugins.name: Plugins Annotations
Plugins.desc: Allows adding personal comments to each installed plugin.

Plugins.name: Quick Explorer
Plugins.desc: Perform file explorer operations (and see your current file path) from the title bar, using the mouse or keyboard

Plugins.name: Quick Tagger
Plugins.desc: Add and remove tags quickly. Tag search results, bulk tag, and add dedicated buttons/commands for your favorites!

Plugins.name: QuickAdd
Plugins.desc: Quickly add new pages or content to your vault.

Plugins.name: Recent Notes
Plugins.desc: List of recently edited notes with previews by time periods

Plugins.name: Remember cursor position
Plugins.desc: Remember cursor and scroll position for each note

Plugins.name: Replace All
Plugins.desc: Replace all in vault.

Plugins.name: Rich Foot
Plugins.desc: Adds backlink tags and created/modified dates to the footer of your notes.

Plugins.name: Scroll Speed
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows you to change the scroll speed inside Obsidian notes.

Plugins.name: Search In Canvas
Plugins.desc: Search text in canvas

Plugins.name: Settings Management
Plugins.desc: Manage settings options, including show enabled/disabled plugins and css, grid layout, save current plugins/css enable config for quick enable/disable, etc.

Plugins.name: Settings Search
Plugins.desc: Globally search settings in Obsidian.md

Plugins.name: Sheets Extended
Plugins.desc: Vertical headers, merged cells, and custom css tables with advanced table compatibility

Plugins.name: Slash Commander
Plugins.desc: Customize the slash command list, assign each command an icon.

Plugins.name: Slides Extended
Plugins.desc: Create markdown-based presentations using reveal.js

Plugins.name: Status Bar Organizer
Plugins.desc: Lets you rearrange and hide specific status bar elements.

Plugins.name: Advanced Tables
Plugins.desc: Improved table navigation, formatting, manipulation, and formulas

Plugins.name: Tag Wrangler
Plugins.desc: Rename, merge, toggle, and search tags from the tag pane

Plugins.name: Templater
Plugins.desc: Create and use templates

Plugins.name: Text Extractor
Plugins.desc: A (companion) plugin to facilitate the extraction of text from images (OCR) and PDFs.

Plugins.name: Todoist Sync
Plugins.desc: Materialize Todoist tasks within Obsidian notes.

Plugins.name: Typewriter Mode
Plugins.desc: Typewriter scroll, highlight current line, dim unfocused paragraphs and sentences, writing focus, restore cursor position and more.

Plugins.name: Various Complements
Plugins.desc: This plugin enables you to complete words like the auto-completion of IDE

Plugins.name: Vertical Tabs
Plugins.desc: Offer an alternative view that displays open tabs vertically, allowing users to group and organize tabs for a better navigation experience.

Plugins.name: Visual Crossing Weather
Plugins.desc: Visual Crossing Weather API for Your Notes

Plugins.name: Waypoint
Plugins.desc: Easily generate dynamic content maps in your folder notes using waypoints. Enables folders to show up in the graph view and removes the need for messy tags!

Plugins.name: Widgets
Plugins.desc: Add widgets to your notes like clock, countdown, and quotes.

Plugins.name: Workspaces Plus
Plugins.desc: Quickly switch and manage workspaces

Plugins.name: Projects
Plugins.desc: Plain text project planning.

Plugins.name: Virtual Linker / Glossary
Plugins.desc: Automatically creates virtual links for text within your notes that match the titles or aliases of other notes in your vault. Create a glossary-like functionality, show unlinked mentions and transform them to real links.

Plugins.name: Custom Node Size
Plugins.desc: Customize nodes size for improved graph understanding.

Plugins.name: Persistent Graph
Plugins.desc: Adds commands to save and restore the positions of nodes on the global graph view

Plugins.name: Sync Graph Settings
Plugins.desc: This is a plugin for syncing various graph settings to Local Graphs

Plugins.name: Open Sidebar on Hover Plus
Plugins.desc: Opens the sidebars by hovering

Plugins.name: PDF++
Plugins.desc: The most Obsidian-native PDF annotation tool ever.

Plugins.name: Image Captions
Plugins.desc: Adds captions to images when there is alt-text specified

Plugins.name: Frontmatter Markdown Links
Plugins.desc: Adds support for markdown links in frontmatter

Plugins.name: Better Markdown Links
Plugins.desc: Adds support for angle bracket links and manages relative links properly

Plugins.name: Map View
Plugins.desc: An interactive map view.

Plugins.name: Hierarchical Outgoing Links
Plugins.desc: Displays outgoing links in a hierarchy

Plugins.name: Supercharged Links
Plugins.desc: Add properties and menu options to links and style them!

Plugins.name: Text Finder
Plugins.desc: Provides a find/replace window in edit mode similar to VSCode (supports regular expressions and case sensitivity).

Plugins.name: Backlink Cache
Plugins.desc: Stores backlink cache to speed up `app.metadataCache.getBacklinksForFile`

Plugins.name: Shell commands
Plugins.desc: You can predefine system commands that you want to run frequently, and assign hotkeys for them. For example open external applications. Automatic execution is also supported, and execution via URI links.

Plugins.name: Enhanced Symbols Prettifier
Plugins.desc: Replace/substitute the symbols with actual symbols you commonly type. It also works for emojis shortcuts, abbreviations, greek letters, math symbols or other snippets/aliases you define

Plugins.name: Shiki Highlighter
Plugins.desc: Highlight code blocks with Shiki.

Plugins.name: External Links
Plugins.desc: List external links and discover which notes reference them.

Plugins.name: Group Snippets
Plugins.desc: Create folder of snippets to activate them in one click !

Plugins.name: File Tree Alternative
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows you to have an alternative file tree view.
